product_name: The North Face Keats Down Delux Insulated Jacket - Women's
long_description: With streetwear style that won't compromise your powder-riding performance, the women's Keats Down Delux jacket by The North Face keeps you cozy on the slopes thanks to lofty goose down insulation. Insulated with quality 550-fill-power down for warmth, light weight and compressibility. Highly water-resistant HyVent(TM) fabric sheds light snow and rain. Removable stretch powder skirt with gripping elastic keeps snow out; snaps let you integrate the powder skirt with compatible pants by The North Face (sold separately). Fully adjustable, detachable hood with removable faux fur trim ensures a weather-blocking, personalized fit; hood can be secured to jacket so it doesn't flap around. External chest pocket with access to media pocket; zip handwarmer pockets; internal goggles pocket. The North Face Keats Down Delux women's insulated jacket has a relaxed fit with a roomy body and sleeves.
short_description: With streetwear style that won't compromise your powder-riding performance, the women's Keats Down Delux jacket by The North Face keeps you cozy on the slopes thanks to lofty goose down insulation.
